subject: Hockey, Ice
Drug Abuse and Traffic
Drugs (Pharmaceuticals)
lead_paragraph: Aaron Boogaard, a brother of the noted enforcer Derek Boogaard who died of an overdose in May, is being held in a jail in Minnesota.
snippet: Aaron Boogaard, a brother of the noted enforcer Derek Boogaard who died of an overdose in May, is being held in a jail in Minnesota.
